tips: 📚 Break study into smaller, manageable sessions: Study for 25-30 minutes and then take a break. This helps improve focus and retention.
💡 Take regular breaks to keep your mind fresh: Utilize short breaks to relax or do something you enjoy. This helps prevent burnout.
📝 Use active recall and spaced repetition: Test yourself on grammar rules regularly and revisit the material after specific intervals to improve memory.
📖 Engage with the material creatively: Try writing short stories or essays using specific grammar rules to see them in action.
🌟 Stay organized and plan ahead: Use a study planner to schedule different grammar topics. Being organized can reduce stress and boost confidence.
